FSS is an industry leader in the production and implementation of biometric identification. We were the first to successfully introduce biometrics into our nation's lunch rooms. Today, FSS™ Secure-ID systems are being used nationwide in a variety of organizations, including the health care, education, convenience, hospitality, age sensitive, government, & membership identification industries. What can FSS do for you? We specialize in biometrics, biometric identification reader products, id scanner products and many other biometric devices in order to find solutions to your everyday problems concerning age sensitive purchases, healthcare, memberships and more. We are dedicated to bringing you the very best in security & efficiency with our line of identification scanners and readers, fingerprint scanners and more. Our FSS Secure-ID systems will save you time & money, as well as the hassles involved with Identification cards & PIN number systems. vea este sitio en espaol

Today, FSS™ Secure-ID systems are being used nationwide in a variety of organizations, including the health care, education, convenience, hospitality, age sensitive, government, & membership identification industries. We are dedicated to bringing you the very best in security & efficiency. Our FSS™ Secure-ID systems will save you time & money, as well as the hassles involved with ID cards & PIN number systems. Here at FSS, we stand ready to earn your business. vea este sitio en espaol Modern clubs are beginning to incorporate VIP/Membership Access systems into their security counters in order to speed up the intake of those customers who would rather not wait in line. Show your VIP's your appreciation -- find out more about our biometric VIP/Membership Access systems. Our systems easily sync with existing time clock system software & allowing them to be used in any environment where members are checking in & out. Our FSS™ Secure-ID biometric access systems are ideal for bank managers who want to be assured that only employees with clearance are allowed behind the counter. These systems are just as beneficial to busy businessmen who are often away from the office & want to be certain that employees are checking in and out on time. Find out more about how our finger scanning biometric systems can be used to solve your membership identification problems. The health care industry is full of headaches that can easily be aided by the biometric medication our FSS™ Secure-ID systems offer. Our systems can easily be integrated alongside with your existing medical records software. Your patients' electronic medical records can be accessed with a simple touch of a finger. Uses for our products include: patient identification, patient check-in systems, electronic medical record (EMR) software integration, & more. FSS wrote the book on cafeteria-based POS biometrics. For the past 20+ or so years, school lunch systems have utilized electronic card readers & PIN numbers for their point-of-sale (POS) transactions. In this day and age, FSS biometric finger scanners are being used in K-12 & college/university lunch rooms across the country & saving those schools substantial amounts of time & money. Our BioWedge solution easily integrates with existing Windows-based point of sale software. Just plug it in! FSS has a complete software solutions suite for K-12 school lunch point-of-sale systems, college and university meal plans, health care cafeterias, long term care facilities and corporate cafeterias. In addition to point-of-sale solutions, FSS provides USDA K-12 free and reduced processing, on line parental account access, and payment processing. Are you sure that customer is of age? His ID card says he is, but what if he is carrying a fake ID? FSS™ Secure-ID Age Sensitive systems can free you of worries & allow you and your staff to stop the guessing game. Our focus is on the development of biometric age and ID verification systems, and creating them to easily integrate with existing ID check software. The fines and penalties associated with serving minors can be horrendous, but pale in comparison to the potential tragedies that can result from underage consumption. to about ways to protect yourselves, as well as the lives of your potential customers. Our FSS convenience suite is perfect for streamlining routine customer identification processes. We ID programs are being enforced across the country, requiring counter attendants to ask for identification every time a customer makes an alcohol or tobacco purchase. Once enrolled using our biometric FSS™ Secure-ID system, return customers can verify their date of birth with just a touch of a finger. The system is capable of capturing how often customers make purchases, the goods they purchase, the time and date of transactions, & much more. Check-cashing services find that the convenience & accuracy of our systems make them well worth the investment. These businesses are dependant on repeat customers, and repeat customers require excellent customer service. If a regular customer were to forget to bring along his ID, and your employees are required to deny him service, there is a good chance you will lose that customers' business indefinitely. We all know it is easier & cheaper to retain customers than to generate them. Find our more about how our FSS™ Secure-ID systems can help you hang on to your customers & increase enrollment. Customer identification is as the heart of hospitality management. Existing systems for managing & identifying customers can be enhanced & streamlined with the integration of FSS™ Secure-ID technology. Whether it is be age identification, VIP registration, POS customer ID, identification for the purpose of enrollment into a child care management/daycare management system, or simply identifying returning customers, our hospitality software suite offers something for everyone. FSS™ Secure-ID systems are perfect for use in: hotels, casinos, bars, lodges, athletic clubs, dance clubs, rental establishments, YMCAs, & more. Government-associated industries are constantly looking for the latest & greatest in technology to help increase security & streamline complicated identification processes. Our products seamlessly integrate into existing jail & prison management, inmate visitation, and visitor management software systems. FSS has also developed a wide rage of identification-related products for use in the government sector, including: enrollee identification, visitor tracking, inmate visitor tracking, homeless tracking, time clock monitoring, & more.

My name is Mitch Johns and I am president and CEO of FSS, Inc., where we have been developing & implementing biometric solutions since 1999. We pioneered and successfully implemented the first-ever biometric ID and pay-system for public and private K-12 schools across the country. FSS, Inc. has received world-wide press coverage for our use of biometrics in allowing students to access their school lunch accounts with only a fingertip. Recently, a front page story on FSS in the Philadelphia Inquirer quickly became an AP wire story. In subsequent weeks USA Today, FOX News, Paul Harvey and even the BBC covered our breakthroughs in biometric technology. Until a few years ago our focus was solely on the educational market, but times have changed. We have expanded our services - finding solutions to problems across a number of markets. I invite you to search this site to find out how FSS SEcure-ID systems can work for you!
